lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "As the largest airline in Europe, and with the sophisticated computer systems we have to help us with yield and load factors management, I think we have a very good chance, if not the best chance, of doing well in a liberalized situation in Europe," Marshall said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: This is because an SAS-Sabena merger could be a test case to determine whether countries are willing to allow landing rights to be transferred from one carrier to another, he said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: British Airways is looking forward to industry deregulation in Europe and believes it will be a smoother transition than the turmoil that followed the opening of the U.
